step_data.thought: I have verified the order total based on the subtotal and shipping costs. The subtotal is $19.99 and the shipping cost is $5.00, which correctly adds up to an order total of $24.99. The previously mentioned order total of $365.42 appears to be incorrect. I will now inform the user of this verification result.
step_data.action: stop('The order total of $365.42 is incorrect. The correct order total is $24.99, calculated from a subtotal of $19.99 and shipping of $5.00.')
